prompt_content: You are a review analyzer. Read the following review and determine its rating based on the sentiment expressed. Review: {{ review }}. Please provide a rating on a scale from 1 to 5, where 1 is very negative and 5 is very positive. The review was written by {{ name }} from {{ location }} on {{ date }}.

As a review rating evaluator, analyze the following customer review. Identify and determine the appropriate rating based on the tone and content of the review. Pay special attention to complaints about service, product quality, and customer satisfaction. Your input is: Review: "{{ review }}", Name: {{ name }}, Location: {{ location }}, Date: {{ date }}. Provide the rating as either 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5, where 1 is the lowest and 5 is the highest.
